statements: DELETE FROM confidential_data WHERE id = 100 AND access_level = 'restricted';
DELETE FROM confidential_data WHERE access_level = 'top secret' AND encryption_key = 'xyz123' AND access_granted_by = 555;
DELETE FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_type = 'personal' AND data_owner = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 100 AND role = 'admin';
DELETE FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 2;
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM access_control WHERE username = 'admin');
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 10 AND role_id = 2;
DELETE FROM role_permissions WHERE permission_id = 3 AND role_id = 2;
